# archestra_user (Data Source)

Fetches an Archestra user by ID or email.

## Example Usage

```terraform
terraform {
  required_providers {
    archestra = {
      source = "archestra-ai/archestra"
    }
  }
}

data "archestra_user" "example" {
  id = "user-id"
}

output "user_name" {
  value = data.archestra_user.example.name
}

output "user_email" {
  value = data.archestra_user.example.email
}

output "user_role" {
  value = data.archestra_user.example.role
}

output "is_banned" {
  value = data.archestra_user.example.banned
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `email` (String) The email address of the user
- `id` (String) User identifier

### Read-Only

- `ban_expires` (String) The expiration time of the user's ban
- `ban_reason` (String) The reason for the user's ban
- `banned` (Boolean) Whether the user is banned
- `created_at` (String) The time the user was created
- `email_verified` (Boolean) Whether the user's email is verified
- `image` (String) The URL of the user's profile image
- `name` (String) The name of the user
- `role` (String) The role of the user
- `two_factor_enabled` (Boolean) Whether the user has two-factor authentication enabled
- `updated_at` (String) The time the user was last updated
